item.title: [Python] A note to someone who uses Python in Visual Studio
item.description: # Install required packages Visual Studio I usually use in C#, but recently Python is also firmly supported I’m using VS, which I’m used to seeing in the UI. ‚óè Version used Microsoft Viusual Studio Community 2015 Python has some libraries, so install and import It is possible to achieve various things with the flow of Gonyoni. However, VS doesn’t seem to read the libraries installed by pip… ##Discover the difference of installation destination Since I was just flipping around on the console, I changed it to the original Python directory.
